name: Slap Game 4
description:
the highly anticipated second OR THIRD installment of the prestigious SLAP GAME franchise, slap game 4 introduces innovations like jumping and AI MOTHS and the brand shiny new godot engine.

Equipped with your regular SLAP and the new SUPER SLAP you will face a wide range of foes including donuts and INANIMATE mugs, but you'll beat all of them because I know you have it in you. You've trained for this. Don't sweat it, I just want you to believe in yourself the same way I believe in you.

Credits

PRETTY MUCH all the models and prettiness in the game was made by Emi @MochiWaifu so please thank her like I did, she is very good. I made the cat tree though, that one was me. She's also who prompted this game by making the paw model.

Also thank yous to my Patreon supporters: John Henry, Maize Wallin, and Shaun. Ya gave me motivation and inspiration.

Controls

WASD: Move
Mouse: Look
Left Click: Slap
Right Click: SLAP HARDER
Escape: Escape. AKA quit. Close. Exit. Leave.
